Reviews.Title: “wonderful stay:thank you PAOLO”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights double roomthe standard size european hotelsthe cleaning service exceptional position public transportation desire doorbut plus front helped short stay enquires map simply greatalways attitude guests job property youre lucky appointed manage hotelwe travel lot 4 5 stars hotel europe manager professional perfectnot luxury hotel italy manager suggest property perfect 5 star hotel paolo stay recommend hotel
